R!sk 2026 is an R Consortium event focused on risk analytics with R. The program includes a two day schedule including talks and lightning talks.

## Goals
- Showcase practical risk analytics with R across industries.
- Share advances in risk modeling, measurement, and reporting.
- Connect the community through hands-on learning.
